TopicTitle: Not sure if this is bad or good but...

Articles.Content:
I think KSP is probably the only forum I've ever forumed on with a mature community that isn't like "be like us or gtfo".

Kinda makes sense though, since a lot of the KSP people around here work for NASA or some other space company.

Or they are like me and just a kid looking to be part of a space program of some sort one day...

No matter who you are, you are a kerbonaut.

So you are like us whethether you want or not

Assimilation confirmed. You are one of us.

And yes, the KSP community is really special. Thats why i like it here best.
This isn't really about KSP itself, so it should probably go in the Space Lounge. Moved.
One of us one of us one of us

I've been lucky enough to have been on multiple such forums (fora?) in my day, but the KSP forum users are top-notch. Even the ones I disagree with, frequently I come to respect their opinions even if I don't agree with them and we remain civil. It's such a nice change from a lot of the rest of the internet

I think it's because we're all smart and creative, else the game wouldn't appeal to us. We're just too awesome to get in an extended huff at each other.

I've been lucky enough to have been on multiple such forums (fora?) in my day, but the KSP forum users are top-notch. Even the ones I disagree with, frequently I come to respect their opinions even if I don't agree with them and we remain civil. It's such a nice change from a lot of the rest of the internet

I think it's because we're all smart and creative, else the game wouldn't appeal to us. We're just too awesome to get in an extended huff at each other.

Nicely expressed, upvoted
True for me too.This is the only forum on the web i have an account for.

Yep, that's right, this forum is the best.

Or maybe THE forum...
I agree, the KSP community is absolutely amazing! Give yourselves a pat on the shoulder from me
You're one of us, now.
